name: HIVE21
description:
HIVE21 is a squad-based real-time strategy game set in the near future where intelligent life forms have invaded earth. 

When you enter the game, humanity has already resisted and is about to fight back. Your mission is to track down and extinguish the largest and most threatening alien breeding hive which has been numbered 21. Seek and destroy HIVE 21!

Struggle through the levels controlling a small squad of specialized soldiers. Each one has its own special abilities. Combine their skills to succeed.
HIVE21 is not meant to be easy - we aim to reach the opposite. However, in this version, you choose the difficulty level by yourself.

We would love to hear about your experience after you beat the game.

Get the fun for free and give a buck if you like what you got ;)
